website_summaries.verdict: Versatility and longevity of use make this high chair one of Graco's top choices. The design has all your child's feeding and seating needs taken care of for years to come.
pros: It goes from high chair to infant and toddler booster and converts to regular table chair that can be used until your child hits 60 pounds
Features 3 recline positions and easy one-hand removable tray
Dishwasher-safe tray insert makes it even more usable
cons: Adjusting and cleaning the straps can be difficult on this model

website_summaries.verdict: Worth the money, especially for parents planning a big family. Works for slightly older children as well. The best on the market.
pros: Focus on safety with 5 point harness
Features wheels and a big tray
cons: Top tray is not dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: i have owned this for like 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: i have owned this for like 2 years now. i purschased it well pregant with my 2nd child, its still working perfectly. its better then i expected. I now have an 8 month old an addition to my 2 year old. . i use the high chair for my baby and use the toddler seat for my 2 year old, defiantly saves me money by having purchased this hight chair. Easy to clean Two trays to allow for easy use Lap and shoulder belts. Buckle child proof in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT - not 6-in-1. This is 4-in-1
customer_reviews.text: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT - Model Number: 1927621 check graco website and you will find out it's 4-in-1
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Buckle stopped working and tray came out and baby fell out. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible accident with my baby girl. When I opened th tray to get her out, she slided to the floor an hit herself. There’s nothing to hold her in between the legs like other chairs. Very dangerous and could cause heavy accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The actual product seems like it will fit our needs and will be durable. I am only leaving a 1 star review for the product due to poor customer service. We received a defective seat cover with our purchase. When I contacted Graco about a replacement, they told me to package up the entire high chair and send it back to amazon to exchange it. No offer to fix the issue, just basically telling me that I had to fix their manufacturing defect myself. Their poor customer service makes me question how well they will respond to future issues or safety concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this high chair! It was super easy to put together, it looks pretty comfy, the recline is perfect for my husband to bottle feed, it's adjustable in height, it wheels around, and I love that the tray is dishwasher safe! My little muffin enjoys playing with his toys on the tray sitting up and eating reclined back!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grandson and we absolutely love this high chair! The seat, cushion and “entire” chair from top to bottom are super easy to clean. The safety harness can be adjusted quite easily. You can move the high chair around your kitchen or dining room with no issues due to the sturdy wheels. We’v had this high chair for a few months now and I am 100% pleased with this product. I wanted to test it out before writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and Cheap make of the seat
customer_reviews.text: The back of the seat is very wobbly - absolutely unexpected for this price tag. It was missing 3 screws.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: The roll is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually loving this chair over my Chicco one. This chair rolls amazing. It’s easy to adjust the height and easy to clean. One thing that I don’t like is my son sits in the chair without a shirt on and his back sticks to the seat cover. You have to very carefully pull the fabric from his back. This chair is very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is like the Cadillac of high chairs! My cousins have it and I knew I just HAD to have it when we were expecting our baby. The recline is perfect for my 3 month old and will last him until he’s ready for a booster at the table. I love the basket in the back to hold extra spoons cloths and bibs. I also love the adjustable height for the table and counter so he can always be where we are! It’s easy to maneuver one handed. I also love the pleather seat which will be so easy to clean! Can’t say enough good things about this amazing high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The very best highchair EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months before giving this review. Wish we would have bought this one first. My son got hurt in different brand. So I looked for the safest highchair I could find/afford. This highchair is worth more than it sells for. Love that 3 kids can use the seat at once. It will last for many year and multiple kids. Wish I could give this 10 stars. The extra padding for extra security when the child is small is great also. I have recommended it to many parents any chance I get. This is by far the best highchair to have. A must buy for all moms and dads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable tray
customer_reviews.text: The tray has the plastic divider that goes between baby's legs, the closer the tray is, the closer the divider is, it pressed against my baby's crotch making it impossible and painful to sit. When I move the tray away, all the food falls on her lap, because it's too far.
customer_reviews.author: Arkady Levitan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. I like that the material it’s easy to clean and the cushion insert is easy to wash with laundry. I love different levels of the height that i can use as well as that the tray is removable and easy to clean. My only problem that to remove the tray you have to push the button in before removing it. Also installing foot tray was the hardest part out of the whole assemble. My friend have the same and they struggle insert that as well. It’s so tight that you feel you will break it while installing. Otherwise highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaD

customer_reviews.title: it's heavy, and The cushion is not very close to the seat,
customer_reviews.text: it seems it's heavy for my wife...The cushion is not very close to the seat, and it is a little loose. When the child is not sitting down, the top cushion is OK, but when my daughter picks it up, it feels that the cushion is falling at any time. There is no Velcro. I think that this is very important as a fixed. In addition, I think this high chair is okay. At least my daughter is willing to sit and eat. So I will not plan to change. Maybe I will accept the cushion slowly The problem does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 10 months before breaking
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl on the highchair is held down by plastic tabs. Around 10 months old my daughter learned how to pull a portion of the vinyl out ruining the plastic tabs. Now, food can get under the vinyl. The tabs are not replaceable and once they are pulled out or bent it is not possible to get them back in. We had to duct tape the chair together. I bought another, much, much cheaper highchair for my next child. For something so expensive, it didn't even make it a year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement ASAP
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion is missing. I bought this fir my first grandchild. And never opened the box. The baby shower was in July and they opened the box this past weekend to set it up since the child is due next month to find it missing. It never said in the description that anything was missing it was new with a damaged box.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this chair if you are planning to use everyday for every meal. I bought this chair based on the great reviews but what a terrible mistake that was. It doesn’t clean well, takes a lot of effort to remove the part to wash them, white tray was stained with carrot pure the very first day.. and now I have a $200 worth of a high chair that looks like it was handed to us.. terrible investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nyc

customer_reviews.title: Our whole family uses this model
customer_reviews.text: Both my sister-in-law and my mother-in-law has this in their house. I decided to buy it myself and I actually love it. It can be set up at the angle leaning back and even further back. Has two different kinds of tables. The padding is removable and washable. It’s easy to move around the kitchen. It also has a different level in height. Oh and there is a different type of booster seat that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Atattooedbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy anything else, this is the best high chair in my experience !
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!!! I love this high chair! Wish I had this with my other two! It has so many options and it’s a steal for everything you can do with it! Nice and sturdy as I was worried that my 2 & 4yr old might hang or push. Locks nicely and has 3 tray options so you can clean one and still keep baby comfortable with the other two while doing so. I can’t get over how perfect this product was made. You won’t regret purchasing it!
customer_reviews.author: Cec

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Versatile Highchair
customer_reviews.text: This has been an extremely versatile highchair for my son, an excellent value, durable, and I have no complaints except for one: I wish the chair had the ability to truly lock down the wheels or not be able to slide around. When my son was a baby, the fact that the chair had wheels was a plus, because it made it easier to move him around. But now that he's a toddler, he pushes himself off the table and all over the place, and even though the wheels lock, they are just hard plastic and so the whole contraptions just slides all over the place. Other than that, this is a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Our Grandson Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, sturdy, and maneuverable. Leaving it in dining room and put grandson in it and "drive" to kitchen table. He loves it, we are comfortable knowing it is safe, Luca is 100% little boy when it comes to eating and makes sure food goes everywhere. Clean-up is necessary everyday but the high chair is super easy to maintain. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steelburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair and use it all over the house. It keeps my very active and independent baby happy so I can get some things done. My only complaint is that it's pretty difficult to maneuver. The big front wheels are stationary so it can be pretty clumsy to move around, especially on carpet. It's also pretty big. The white tray on top (which comes off to reveal a much smaller gray tray) prevents it from going through regular door frames. But other than that it's great. We love all the different seating options.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Great for your kid to grow into 👍
customer_reviews.text: So love this chair can be with my child into the toddler years for the price point. Pros: * Shipped fast * Wasn't too hard to assemble * Love that your child straps in * Wheels functionality * Easy to clean Cons: * Screws missing that secure footrest (luckily I had some) * Although it was easy to put together I found the video on YouTube the most helpful * There's wheels but the thing feels stiff or like ours locked when it isn't
customer_reviews.author: Byrd House

customer_reviews.title: Good high chair to grow with your baby!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small place so I was worried about this high chair, but its a perfect size, even for our small apartment. It was easy to put together and its super easy to use. I like the seat back reclines and I am excited that this will grow with my baby girl. If i could change one thing, id make the infant pillow a little more food proof/easy to clean fabric. But honestly its a good buy and my baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Moves great! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I swore I wasn’t going to get a big high-chair but I gave in and I’m so glad I did! I love this thing. It moves around my kitchen so easily and is easy to get my son in and out. The removable tray make for an easy clean up. Also, the price is amazing considering how pricey high chairs can get. I’m sure I’ll be using this for years, so for the price you just can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 1 deal!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, let's just say this is the Cadillac of highchairs! I am highly impressed with my purchase of this Graco highchair! We bought this because we have another baby on the way, And our first born is 1 1/2. Both girls are able to use this one high chair! The baby can use the high chair part while the removable booster that was underneath can be used for our other daughter. WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive and children love it!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this highchair there was a tear in the arm rest. Amazon so kindly sent a free replacement. But it looks a little more grey than the first one. That's ok tho! I love this highchair! Gives my child a great posture and she looks so happy and comfy in this!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is for my granddaughter. She is 9 mos old so the first padding section she has already outgrown so we are not using that part but the chair itself is very nice. WE love the recline feature so if she falls asleep she can just stay in the chair. I love the trays...they are easy to clean and easy to attach and detach. I love being able to wheel the high chair around the kitchen so she can be very close to me while I'm preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Wen

customer_reviews.title: This high chair is pretty much the best investment we have for baby
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is pretty much the best investment we have for baby. It’s quite expensive but totally worth it. Quality is excellent and we have been using it for almost 6 months now and has always worked great. Our baby is most comfortable on it and loves to spend so much time on here aside from mealtime. It’s easy to move around and not bulky either. The trays are great; perfect sizes and definitely suit baby’s needs whether you put food on it or you could change it when you just want to put some toys for some playtime. Highly recommended and would definitely buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this high chair! Its very pleasing to look at unlike others that I've seen...it has 3 different trays which is amazing! It went together quite easily although I did have to watch a video on how to put it together bc in my opinion the directions weren't all that great at explaining. But it has 6 height adjustments and several different reclining positions which is also great! It pushes around easily as well for easy access to the table or just wherever youre feeding your little one. Altogether I think it's a great high chair and we'll worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks. The pictures do it no justice. It almost looks like a designer high chair of some sort. I don't like the fact that the front wheels do not move independently, the rear wheels do though it's like a reverse shopping cart. I think there maybe a legit reason why though. The seat cover you can clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: President Obama

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp on a high chair. This one is well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to spend so much on a high chair but my husband liked this one because it was really sturdy when he shook it (we looked at it in a physical store). 7 months later, we just bought a second one to keep at Grandma's. We user it for so much not than feeding. I pop her in it to play while I cook dinner or do the dishes. That's where the wheels and sturdiness come in so handy. I'm glad I listened to my husband on this one. Save your money on other things and you've your highchair. It'll make your life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: The first one that came was warped and was quickly replaced with a non defective high chair. It’s sturdy (toddler can’t push it over). It helps my 6 month old sit upright and comfortable. Tray comes off and cleans easily, assembly was easy but you do need to be forceful when putting the foot rest on. Wipes down well but not looking forward to when she eats things like spaghetti 🍝 that will be a test to how it cleans. I don’t think this chair takes up as much room as our older carter’s high chair did.
customer_reviews.author: emilyk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very easy to clean & i love the basket in the back I can store wipes for easy cleaning and all of baby's bibs. I didnt see enough reviews on this product they all were on the regular blossom chair, from what I see they are the same no difference really besides the storage basket and style. I thought the assembly process would be difficult but it was super easy! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use, takes up space, easy to clean, no basket attachment
customer_reviews.text: Seat is great! Takes up a bit of space, but easy to clean, adjust, and move around. Sits high enough that I can stand and feed my daughter. I have not used it as anything except a high chair so far. 5 point harness allowed me to set her in it as early as 4 mo old. Does NOT come with storage basket attachment as advertised. This was the only disappointment. Haven’t been able to figure out where to buy only the attachment but it would be very useful. The only other thing id change about the seat is having somewhere I could attach toys so my daughter couldn’t drop or throw them.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Berendt Boyle

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for something very comfortable, easy to move around and easy to clean, this is absolutely your best bet, I am SO in love with this high chair I can’t believe it! Not only is the padding on this chair so thick and comfortable for my daughter, it’s very easy to clean and keep clean, it’s easy to pull around our kitchen area because of the wheels on the bottom and my goodness this high chair is super sturdy! It’s worth every penny you’re going to spend on it! My daughter absolutely loves her chair and get so exited when she sees it! 10/10 would forever recommend this high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Breaks need to be at the front
customer_reviews.text: Good chair and has a lot of functionality! Very comfortable for babies as mine enjoyed sitting on it. However, my two concerns are- 1. The breaks are on the back wheels which makes it hard to control. One HAS to put their leg within the wheel frame before seating and removing a baby. Frankly a safety hazard in my book. 2. The belt material tends to collect food deposits. I guess that’s a downside of requiring friction on the belt. That’s the only reason I would give it 4 stars. The good part is that there are three trays, decent material and good higher and leg features.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Decent high chair
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent high chair but the cushions are not that soft for the baby. The wheels are cheap plastic so it has no grip. Even when you lock the wheels the chair can still slide so be careful with your baby. I still have to put my foot in the base of the chair to hold it to prevent it from sliding when getting the baby in and out of it. Pretty easy to put together and straight forward to use. Would be great if the seat height was adjustable with better locking wheels.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best ALL IN ONE!!!!! look no further!
customer_reviews.text: What does this product not have?!!!! The tray is actually THREE trays, the seat is TWO seats with several settings! It took approx 15 minutes to put together with 1 person. The colors are so pretty and neutral! The wheels work awesome and we’ve used ours indoors and on our wood porch and both work great! The chair can be couch height or standing height and everything in between. I wish I’d have know how great this product was sooner! BUY IT! you WONT be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deziel Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Similar to a much more expensive high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems great! I love how it can be used for so long, with all the different configurations. We bought for a long visit with our grandsons here, We used the booster seat part for the 4 year old, (he never would use the portable strap on Booster seat we had bought previously), while 1 year old uses rest of high chair. It came quick, is easy to clean, and has all the features 3 x more expensive high chair the our kids had bought. Only complaint is we can't find a way to lock it so the older boy can't push it around. I'd still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BLFine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the newborn padding doesn't really connect in any way to the seat, but it's well padded, doesn't feel cheap, has many options when it comes to your growing kid, and easy to put together. Kind of bulky if you have a smaller dining room, but I think I'd want this regardless. You won't have to worry about seating your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Blains

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the time frame specified by Amazon well packaged bad protected. Assembly was a breeze. This high chy glides along the floor with ease. It's very easy to clean and my son loves it. It seems to be very comfortable to him. You can adjust the height of this. The seat back can be tilted to different positions from Upright to Semi reclined. The foot rest is adjustable also. The tray is easy to remove and is like 3 in 1. Great High chair
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Purnell Askew SR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it has multiple trays, once its dirty I can easily take a layer off and clean it! The cushion is also easily cleaned with lysol wipes pr a wet cloth.. my baby is 9 months old so she makes a MESS every time, but glad i can easily clean it... love how heightis adjustable and how seat can recline or be in up right position... also the little wheels makes it easy to move her to where ever we are eating or sitting at!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure buying a high chair I’ve never seen but this is a high quality chair. It’s functional, easy to use, and so easy to clean. I’m in love with it. As a mom, I want to feel secure with my baby in the high chair and I want the chair to be easy to clean. This is both. Plus it will last him for such a long time. It converts for all stage of my little mans life. It’s easy to move around but doesn’t move if I don’t want it to. Perfect for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble (took me about 15 minutes). Seems durable. Mine was slightly scratched but too much of a hassle to return. Also, I was expecting (based off of others pictures) to have the little storage basket underneath and didn’t (model dependent) just an FYI. My little one is 3.5 months old and this is helpful to have him near by when we are on the kitchen. He seems comfortable. The wheels make life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome and unsafe unless you use straps
customer_reviews.text: The big design flaw is that the tray is also the thing that keeps the baby from siding off. It's tough to strap in the baby while the tray is out. If you don't strap the baby, there's the danger of falling. My daughter dislikes the straps and fights it. So sometimes I let her sit without strapping. She managed to knock the tray off by wiggling around and then crashed to the ground. Needless to say I don't use this high chair anymore. Also it's big, heavy, and cumbersome. The IKEA high chair we have was $20 and is better in almost every way.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Major flaws
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept high chair.Multi tasking and have many trays plus booster seat.But the straps are poor quality and too rough for my 4 months old.It always gives him marks on his chest.The back cushion is nice concept specially for babies but hope it was made of good quality.My LO gets sweaty within 15min after sitting and starts crying.For $165 you cannot expect these.Hope they improve these features other than that it’s ok product.Wish it was perfect high chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for moms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby high chair when my daughter was two months old. I like the design of this product very much. As it can be used from the baby to toddler, it is easy to install, it is very strong, the back and height can be adjusted, and there is pulley on the bottom, it is comfortable and safe for the baby to sit on. My family and I like this product very much!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, safe & comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! The best part is the multiple “layers” of table top you get. I find myself not having time to clean the tray right away, you essentially can have three meals before having to clean any table top for them (large white cover, large wight tray, small black tray). You can adjust it close to your baby, maneuver easily and it’s comfy for them with the added security of top and bottom straps as well as a “cone” in between legs so no slipping out is possible. I am so happy with this product and excited to use the other stages as we progress!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: High Recommend Good Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair when my daughter start to eat food other than milk. We are having the chair for almost a year, we use the chair at least three time a day. Very easy to clean, good quality. My daughter seen also like it. We still using the chair. There is nothing we can complain. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby's first high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is baby's first high chair so far so good. Only thing I wish was that the tray would swing instead of having to be taken all.the way out. Apart from that chair was easy to assemble keeps baby well strapped in and haven't had any cleaning issues so far but it hasn't been long since purchase. Will update about cleaning in another month's time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very upset experience!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, took FOREVER to deliver! I was so excited to finally receive the high chair, BUT it is not brand new because there are very noticeable scratches/ marks on the legs and most importantly, this package is missing the 2 wheels and the 3 screws that are supposed to be included in the package! Very very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair and have been using it since my son started eating solids. He knows when it's time to eat when I take the tray off. The highchair has 3 sets of trays. The black bottom being the smallest when they get better at eating. The trays are easy to clean. I use a cleaner spray to get stains like red sauce out. The straps and padding back you can wash and hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: Awakeforyou23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic high chair. The wheels are really nice and your youngster may enjoy being pushed around in it. The design seems much more comfortable than others that I've seen in person. My only complaint is that I wish it was a little taller, so it wouldn't be as awkward while feeding my son. But I'm over 6ft tall. This high chair gets higher than most too.
customer_reviews.author: DASBOOT

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister. She had a new foster child that needed help keeping his head up to eat. This was a huge help! She’s constantly telling me how much she loves it! (I researched before buying it and she thought I was crazy for the price but I’m a firm believer in “you get what you pay for”. This did not disappoint.)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for a good quality highchair. I am really pleased with this. Easy to assemble and has a lot of features. I currently use it for my four month old to sit in while I cook. The seat has four different positions which is very helpful. I love the basket on the back to hold her toys and bibs. The extra toddler seat is great for when we have company or once she is old enough. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ATubbs

customer_reviews.title: Bought new, came used and dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with how my item arrived. Dusty, dirty, some type of hair, chips and scratches. Definitely looks like it has been used before. The zip ties were already cut and laying in the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair! This is our 3rd highchair through 4 different kids, and it is by far my favorite. I was easy to assemble all but one piece just snapped together, and the cover can easily be taken off to be cleaned. The reclining positions are awesome for infants. The only downside is that the locking wheels in the back do lock but they still slide very easily, I can pull the highchair to me just as easily as if it weren't locked. All-in-all its perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Britaini

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: I packed this highchair in my highlander for 500 miles to my sister for the holiday. It was very compact. It did not take up much space at all. We were very happy we took the chair. It very sophisticated looking. It has so many interchangeable part. The baby love sitting in the chair. She is 9 month and will sit for an hour. Playing. Patty cake and learning where her ears. nose and eyes. Easy to clean, put together and take a part. Highly recommend!!!!! Great price for the money and the years to come. Buy it!!!@@!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: This IS THE high chair you should get!
customer_reviews.text: From a new - first time mom, By far the best high chair on the market. Our son has been in this since 3 months and it is amazing. We move him all over the kitchen, wheels turn on a dime, the safety harness is easy to use and keeps him snug and comfortable and I love how it will grow with him. One of the best purchases we made for him so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Such a big elaborate high chair for my little baby! couldn't pass up a spending $10 more from the basic high chair to this one which has so many options! not too complicated to assemble, materials are of good quality. Appreciate that the tray doesn't always have to be used, we kept the booster seat in the garage till she needs it. Like the wheels for easy rolling to bring baby into whatever room or closer to the table we are all eating at. Materials are easy for cleanup. Expect to use this for many, many, many more years! Would definitely recommend this brand and style of high chair to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Graco Blossom 6-in-1 high chair with my older daughter and loved it. The only problem with this one is it seems to be made a bit cheaper then the one I owned before. The plastic piece that screws in to the back of the footrest was a headache to get on. Some of the plastic “legs” were hitting each other and the holes wouldn’t line up. But overall this is a fantastic high chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Velazco

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: Seems very comfortable still struggling with the straps a little but very easy to put together, I saw in the directions there was a net that goes under product and I didnt get a net so im not sure if they forgot this piece or its a sold separate piece so that us why I gave it 4 stars for now but will be updating as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: best high chair out there
customer_reviews.text: love the wheels and the range of motion on this high chair. many other chairs have rough undersides and my wife and i spent awhile feeling all of the chairs at toys r us and this was the smoothest. it is easy to clean and all the pieces can come off (including straps - just remember to put them in the correct way afterwards ;)). after using it with our son for 8 months, we love it and purchased this for our relative with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Well made, so versatile!
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair! It’s soft and supportive, and we love how it will grow with our baby. I love the dishwasher-safe tray and how it snaps closed at a couple places, accommodating our baby as he grows. Soft cushion is washable and faux leather is so easy to wipe down. Wheels are convenient to move the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: *amanda*

customer_reviews.title: Just a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been helping our little one sits with us for meals. It has good amount of adjustments and moves around fairly easily. The wheels can be locked from rolling away. There are two stack-able trays which are very useful because you don't have to clean the tray all the time - you can clip way the top one to continue using the 2nd tray immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Denzil Khine

customer_reviews.title: The best! Look no more!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the best high chair available. My daughter can sit in it after she eats and while I get cleaning and stuff done. It's so comfy for her. It really is a LIFESAVER. I have a cheap one for the garage, since we spend a lot of time there in the summer and there's no comparison. She wants out as soon as she is done. It's super easy to wipe down and I've only thrown it in the washing machine once since I've had it. Weeeeeeeelllllll worth the money! Ask if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair has it all! It is pricier than some but this chair has everything you might need in a high chair. It’s very easy to roll around and is very well made. It’s really easy to transition between the different positions and very smooth to switch up. I haven’t had to clean food off it yet but it seems like it should wipe off pretty well. The chair looks super comfy and my 3 month old likes sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to maintain and clean
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a baby gift from my registry and we love it. So versatile and can't go wrong! Super easy to clean, too. Although, we haven't really let her make a big mess but so far all stains came out, even after days or weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Jade A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: SO glad we went with this one. We put our 3 month old in it now just to play. The straps hold him up well and he’s learning head control still. Also comes with so many options. We’ll be able to use the booster for him when older while using high chair at same time for our next baby. Great buy. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was my wife's idea as I did not want to pay this much for a high chair. After a week I can say that I am happy she chose this chair. When putting it together I felt the materials were sturdy and I expect this will survive future children and will likely serve someone else well after that as a second hand item. Side note, assembly was pretty straight forward with the directions in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love the wheels.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. My kid absolutely loves being in his, and it is easy to keep it clean. The plastic wipes down well and the straps come out and I throw them in the washer as needed. Love that it is on Wheels, so glad my mom convinced me to get one that was. This way he can move around from room to room with me and help me do everything from fold clothes to do the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Arms

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended highchair if you don't mind it taking some space at your house
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is amazing! The pros: 1. Mobility is great. Move smoothly and soundlessly 2. Extremely sturdy. 3. Super easy assemble. 4. Table tray cleaning is easy too as it comes with an extra top-on tray. 5. Leather seat, makes the cleaning over the entire seat easy too. Cons: Can not be folded.
customer_reviews.author: CloHe

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair and most about it except putting the tray on.
customer_reviews.text: I think this high chair is great! There is only one downfall for me... the tray. Its hard to put on. I don’t know when it connects or slides properly unless I look under the tray to see. I keep mine up all the time so I haven’t folded or stored it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reliable, inexpensive highchair that would last us through our two girls. So far, this highchair has not disappointed. My toddler likes to sit in the kitchen while I cook. She colors, watches me, plays with her toys and isnt under foot! The inner tray is removable, to uncover a larger, flat tray. The wheels make it easy to maneuver her around while she remains in the chair. The fabric itself is extremely easy to wipe down, and dries quickly! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: I caught this high chair during a great sale from amazon warehouse. This chair is the successor to the other multi stage chair I bought for my toddler when she was a baby. The best improvement is the tray as it now has guide rails preventing the child from removing the tray just be pressing the button.
customer_reviews.author: csweatjr

customer_reviews.title: Checks most boxes
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, we are pretty pleased with all the different options and functions. I really wish if you're going to build a high chair comparable in price to wooden ones that you would include a more substantial foot rest which is very important for posture. Also, it looks in the pictures like the booster seat mounts to the bottom. It does not, it's just for the picture. We just have to pack it away until our baby is older
customer_reviews.author: Paul and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: a little bit hard to assemble and hard to control the direction of moving!
customer_reviews.text: It has different adjustment setting which is good for a baby from 3 month to 2 yr I guess. The only thing I would say is it took me and my husband two hours to assemble. The assemble instruction is not that clear. First, I was satisfied with this but after a few days I found it was too difficult to move this high chair. The direction of wheels is very hard to control!
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Best highchair
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on highchairs and finally decided on this one. I have been using it for 3 months now and love it. The fabric cleans easily, it rolls around my kitchen nice, I dont havd to worry about pinched fingers. Its really everything in one chair. I am very glad that it will grow with him and it was also important to me that it looked nice in our home as it was big and going to be around for awhile. The black and white model looks sleek and stylish. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: A.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Multi use high chair that will grow with my grandbaby!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of this high chair! It's sleek and the colors are neutral, so it blends in with the furnishings in my Great Room. Since it doesn't fold up, and I can't hide it away in a closet, it was important to me that it just blended in and didn't ruin the look of my room. I had a bit of trouble figuring out how to put it all together---had to watch a YouTube video several times, hoping to find the "missing instructions" for what went to the high chair and what went to the booster chair. It was confusing at first, but I figured it out, and I'm very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bertolotti

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It comes with so many different things and lots of different ways to use their chair! It’s cute, sturdy, easy to move around and height adjustable! It’s perfect if you want to eat dinner at the table with baby. It was very expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the infant option
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has a seat for an infant. I exclusively pump and it’s difficult to do that while also needing to feed the baby. This allows for him to be on the same level as me and I can easily multitask. It’s also a good place for him to sit and be up away from the dog. Love that it will grow with him
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move, its just like a new ride for my baby
customer_reviews.text: My 4month old just loves sitting on it. The wheels really made this chair easy to move and i can take my baby along from one room to another when he is sitting tight with the belts on. Definitely One of the best chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gagandeep

customer_reviews.title: Best Highchair
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this for my son! Bought as a 2nd highchair for my daughter, and love that it has a booster for my son. Great quality, very easy to clean and the wheels move very easily. Washed a few times and still looks great (don't dry, drip dry or air dry). 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: The harness needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan. It is sturdy and good quality plastic but the lever for leaning the seat back doesn't always work and it offers very little support for a baby just starting out. Falling out is a huge risk. My baby can lean all the way over the side. The value is good but the design leaves baby at risk. The harness needs to be a lot better but that's the problem with most Graco products.
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: Best. High chair. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This may be a pricier high chair, but it was worth every penny. Cleans easily, the wheels make it extremely easy to move around, and the tray has withheld many a messy meal. We pulled the diving insert off the tray, and it works great for us. We absolutely love this thing, and it comes with so many extra parts that you’ll even have a travel chair left over.
customer_reviews.author: K J

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed when I took out all the pieces to put the chair together. The bottom of the leg was very bent and all scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Barnhouse

customer_reviews.title: An investment
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was a little pricey for a high chair, but it is really a great investment. I love that it has wheels. Fits with adjustable straps, can be washed and hung to dry. Great for snacking with a removal tray. For new moms and grandparents, you will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to move around, and easy clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 month old child and it’s a great product. The seat has extra padding so it soft. The wheel design also makes it easy to move the high chair around to different area around the house. It’s super easy to clean any mess. The tray is also smooth sliding in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where those negative reviews come from. Many of them complain about the difficulty of assembling it. It took me 10 min to do it. Super easy. Clear instructions. Nice chair. I just finished assembling it. Haven't tried it yet, but looks nice and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: gaga

customer_reviews.title: I got this from Amazon Wearhouse shown as “opened box” ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this from Amazon Wearhouse shown as “opened box”. All the parts and pieces were there but 3 screws and the instructions. It was simple enough to put together without instructions, but I did end up looking online just to make sure what I did was correct. A few scratches on the bottom of the frame, but nothing you could see unless looking for it. I got it about $70 less then if brand new, so I had no problems with the missing items or scratches. It’s what I wanted and I am hoping to use it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great high chair. It was a little difficult for my husband to put together, but he's not overly handy. It took me a little while to get used to the tray part (that moves so you can put your child in and out of), it's in the front versus on the side, I kept accidently pulling it out, all of the way and it made it harder to put my child in and out of. Once I got used to it being in the front it's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very Versital
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and very quickly. I chose this particular highchair knowing we will have another grandbaby that will need to use the highchair and large tray, and that we can the use the booster seat and additional smaller tray securely strapped to a diningroom chair with a then toddler age older sibling. There are all sorts of combinations to use the main highchair, two trays and included solid booster seat. I'm sure we will get plenty of use out of this highchair in the future as my son's family grows and comes to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie B.

customer_reviews.title: the seat easy change color
customer_reviews.text: I buy this one for my baby. I feel small. I can not use long time. even my baby just 14 kg. other thing I just use couple time. the seat change color already. my baby eat watermelon. the seat get red color. I try to celan. but it does not work. I feel no happy
customer_reviews.author: xueyang gao

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best high chair I have ever seen or used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best high chair I have ever seen or used. It has to many conversions as your baby grows. AND it comes with a separate toddler booster- so my 4 year old can use that now. Double the value. Only downside (not ONE other downside) is that the front wheels don't swivel. It's hard to maneuver it Bc only the back wheels rotate. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to ANYONE who asks. Slightly More expensive but it grows with your child. SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob N. G. D.

customer_reviews.title: My son like it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I really like it. My son don't mind sitting in it and making a mess. It is very wide so it takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Best highchair ever!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing! I love all of the different seating options. The 3 trays will definitely come in handy. The cloth top cushion seems like it will hold up in the washer and the main cover has a leathery feel that is great to just wipe clean. Love that i can take the tray off one handed because the baby is usually in my other arm. Easy assembly and great look. We are very happy with our purchase... Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Renate M.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect high chair
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a while or what high chair to get my 6 month old. This one is perfect! She is so comfortable and it’s the perfect size. I can adjust the height, and customize it for her. It only took 15 minutes to assemble. Easy to clean and I love how I can roll her around wherever I am. I do however wish the wheel locks were a little tighter on the lock position. When I lock it I can still move her around. Just have to keep an eye on her
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Love the Chair
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is thick on the high chair easy handle on leveling the chair or to recline I have attached photos. The only assemble trouble I had in the instructions did not show you have to remove booster seat before attaching the backseat of chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie L.

customer_reviews.title: Love  this but be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this highchair BUT my only critique is the harness. Clipping my son into his seat is a challenge when he is squirming around because you have to clip each harness (you have 4 pieces). Hope that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco Blossom 6 in 1 Convertible High Chair, Sapphire
product_meta.description:
Style:Blossom 6 in 1| Color:SapphireThe Graco Blossom 6-in-1 Highchair grows with your family, offering multiple seating options for infant to toddler, and can seat two children at once if family grows. It transforms seamlessly from an infant highchair to a traditional highchair, an infant booster, a toddler booster, and finally a youth chair. The 6 height adjustments provide the perfect fit for baby at the table. The 3-position removable footrest and 3 recline positions will ensure your growing child stays comfortable at mealtime. Features a premium leatherette seat pad that is both wipe able and machine washable for easy cleanup and comfort.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: 6 in 1 highchair that grows with Your family
6 height Adjustments and 3 recline positions ensure Easy feedings
One hand removable tray with dishwasher safe, pull out insert
Adjustable and removable seat back insert helps position Your growing child at the table

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,517 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
